Text:
Thank you (!!) for sharing this with us :D

Been wanting to read this ever since I read The Salmon of Doubt by Douglas Adams a few years ago (he mentioned it in there somwhere), and recommendations by such a genius is not to be ignored. I will buy this book!
I read this book at work while pretending to do useful stuff. When I get to the end, I start over. Fantastic fucking book this one.
Thanks for sharing and I will buy it anyway.
